long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Level up your game and use Planning Poker for Google Meet:

Planning Poker for Agile Teams on Google Meet is designed for making estimation straightforward, collaborative and intuitive. This Agile technique allows you and your team to estimate the effort required for tasks or user stories. Use Planning Poker directly within Google Meet without switching platforms so you can engage in real-time discussions and estimations.

Let the game begin:

1. Open Planning Poker by clicking on the extension.
2. Open the Chat Window in your meeting.
3. Choose your estimate; a thumbs-up emoji will appear, signaling to other players that you have 4. selected your estimate.
4. Click 'Reveal Estimations' to synchronously display all players' estimates.

Share your experience and leave a review!

The application is exclusively available on http://meet.google.com.
